javadoc: Command class to add a shifted memory reference to the program.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Command constructor for adding a shifted memory reference

params.name: fromAddr
params.comment: address of the codeunit where the reference occurs

params.name: toAddr
params.comment:
computed as the value of the operand at opIndex shifted
 by the number of bits specified by shiftValue

params.name: refType
params.comment: reference type - how the location is being referenced.

params.name: opIndex
params.comment: the operand index in the code unit where the reference occurs

params.name: shift
params.comment: the number of bits to shift the value by

name: AddShiftedMemRefCmd
comment: Command class to add a shifted memory reference to the program.
